official_title: To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to reform the public housing program.

summary.text: Public Housing Improvement Act of 1994 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to repeal the public housing demolition one-for-one replacement requirement. Permits the use of modernization funds for cost-effective new construction. Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to transfer the management of chronically troubled public housing agencies to private management.

titles.title: To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to reform the public housing program.
